dict.string: Depresso needs access to your health data to provide personalized mental health insights, track your wellness journey, and detect patterns that may affect your mood.
Depresso will sync your health metrics to provide better mental health analysis and personalized recommendations.
We need access to your microphone to let you dictate your journal entries.
We need speech recognition to convert your voice into text for your journal.
Depresso uses device motion to analyze your movement patterns and provide insights into your wellbeing.
